name: Feels
detailed_description:
Introduction

Who are you and why did you come upon this land?
This Is A Dark Age and Not A Place to Be.
Peasants do not leave their houses, lords stay in their castles.
We're at the edge of the realm and unpleasant things are hiding out there.
Do Not Take the Ambient Silence For Granted.
The fragile balance had been disrupted and terrible events are about to happen.
If you're bold enough, you might be able to change this place's fate.
But act wisely and remember, there will be no second chance.

What is this game?

Feels is an ASCII and text based RPG that runs on the command prompt. In this game you can play the way you want. Every one of your decisions, actions and non-actions can influence the world in which you evolve. Because Feels is not limited by advanced graphics, it aims to deliver many ways to play, as well as a profound depth for the path you're choosing.

short_description: Feels is an ASCII based RPG where every one of your decisions can influence the world in which you evolve. It is filled with organic story lines, diverse endings and strategic turn-based combat.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8, or 10
  • Processor: 2GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 128MB
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
